FuncDef: The reset radius-server accounting-packet all command clears all cached accounting packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
the NE40E retransmits cached accounting packets to a RADIUS accounting server based on the configured number of times that accounting packets are retransmitted. When the number of retransmission failures reaches the configured number of times that accounting packets are retransmitted, the NE40E clears the cached accounting packets. To clear all cached accounting packets, run the reset radius-server accounting-packet all command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
